lines.text: Are you Ah Sing? Understand? You understandee English?
Don't forget, it's easier to be tolerant and understanding at fifty than it is to be at twenty-five.
Life? A barren frustrated boyhood. A marriage to a woman who accepted my love and despised me so thoroughly she resorted to murder?
In this world, you turn the other cheek, and you get hit with a lug wrench.
It's wonderful the way tools seem to come alive in your hands.
I grabbed a hamburger while I was waiting for you; I can still taste the harness.

[First lines]
Impact, the force with which two lives come together. Sometimes for good, sometimes for evil.
When you trust folks, you trust 'em, and you give 'em a chance to work out things the way that seems right to them.
How can one little woman be so big?
